segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Advanced Options Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Advanced Options Page

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Advanced Options Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Advanced Options Page

segment.source: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Advanced Options Page
segment.target: Application Virtualization Sequencing Wizard Advanced Options Page

segment.source: Use the Advanced Options page of the Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencing Wizard to specify advanced options for the application to be installed.
segment.target: Use the Advanced Options page of the Application Virtualization (App-V) Sequencing Wizard to specify advanced options for the application to be installed.

segment.source: The page contains the elements described in the following table.
segment.target: The page contains the elements described in the following table.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Block Size
segment.target: Block Size

segment.source: Use to specify the size of blocks that the SFT file will be divided into when streamed across a network.
segment.target: Use to specify the size of blocks that the SFT file will be divided into when streamed across a network.

segment.source: All blocks equal the specified size; however, the last block might be smaller than specified.
segment.target: All blocks equal the specified size; however, the last block might be smaller than specified.

segment.source: Select one of the following values:
segment.target: Select one of the following values:

segment.source: 4 KB
segment.target: 4 KB

segment.source: 16 KB
segment.target: 16 KB

segment.source: 32 KB
segment.target: 32 KB

segment.source: 64 KB
segment.target: 64 KB

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: When you select a block size, consider the size of the SFT file and your network bandwidth.
segment.target: When you select a block size, consider the size of the SFT file and your network bandwidth.

segment.source: A file with a smaller block size takes longer to stream over the network but is less bandwidth-intensive.
segment.target: A file with a smaller block size takes longer to stream over the network but is less bandwidth-intensive.

segment.source: Files with larger block sizes might stream faster, but they use more network bandwidth.
segment.target: Files with larger block sizes might stream faster, but they use more network bandwidth.

segment.source: Through experimentation, you can discover the optimum block size for streaming applications on your network.
segment.target: Through experimentation, you can discover the optimum block size for streaming applications on your network.

segment.source: Enable Microsoft Update During Monitoring
segment.target: Enable Microsoft Update During Monitoring

segment.source: Enables installation of Microsoft Updates during the Sequencing Wizard's monitoring phase.
segment.target: Enables installation of Microsoft Updates during the Sequencing Wizard's monitoring phase.

segment.source: Rebase DLLs
segment.target: Rebase DLLs

segment.source: Enables remapping of supported dynamic-link libraries to a contiguous space in RAM, saving memory and improving performance.
segment.target: Enables remapping of supported dynamic-link libraries to a contiguous space in RAM, saving memory and improving performance.

segment.source: Back
segment.target: Back

segment.source: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's previous page.
segment.target: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's previous page.

segment.source: Next
segment.target: Next

segment.source: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's next page.
segment.target: Accesses the Sequencing Wizard's next page.

segment.source: Cancel
segment.target: Cancel

segment.source: Terminates operation of the Sequencing Wizard.
segment.target: Terminates operation of the Sequencing Wizard.

segment.source: Template Token Value
segment.target: Template Token Value

segment.source: Use the Advanced Options page of the App-V Sequencing Wizard to specify advanced options for the application you are sequencing.
segment.target: Use the Advanced Options page of the App-V Sequencing Wizard to specify advanced options for the application you are sequencing.

segment.source: This page contains the elements described in the following table.
segment.target: This page contains the elements described in the following table.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Allow Microsoft Update to run during monitoring
segment.target: Allow Microsoft Update to run during monitoring

segment.source: Specifies whether software updates will be applied to the application during the monitoring phase of application sequencing.
segment.target: Specifies whether software updates will be applied to the application during the monitoring phase of application sequencing.

segment.source: This option is helpful if updates are required to successfully complete the application installation.
segment.target: This option is helpful if updates are required to successfully complete the application installation.

segment.source: This option is not selected by default.
segment.target: This option is not selected by default.

segment.source: Rebase Dlls
segment.target: Rebase Dlls

segment.source: Enables remapping of supported dynamic-link libraries to a contiguous space in RAM.
segment.target: Enables remapping of supported dynamic-link libraries to a contiguous space in RAM.

segment.source: Selecting this option can help manage memory and improve application performance.
segment.target: Selecting this option can help manage memory and improve application performance.

segment.source: This option is not selected by default.
segment.target: This option is not selected by default.

segment.source: Back
segment.target: Back

segment.source: Goes to the previous page of the wizard.
segment.target: Goes to the previous page of the wizard.

segment.source: Next
segment.target: Next

segment.source: Goes to the next page of the wizard.
segment.target: Goes to the next page of the wizard.

segment.source: Cancel
segment.target: Cancel

segment.source: Discards the settings and exits the wizard.
segment.target: Discards the settings and exits the wizard.

segment.source: Template Token Value
segment.target: Template Token Value

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Sequencing Wizard
segment.target: Sequencing Wizard
